name: stamp-card-system
description: Digital stamp card web service for customer loyalty

scripts.backend: npm run build:shared && npm run start:dev --workspace=@stamp-card/backend
scripts.frontend: npm run build:shared && npm run dev --workspace=@stamp-card/frontend
scripts.dev: npm run build:shared && concurrently "npm run start:dev --workspace=@stamp-card/backend" "npm run frontend"
scripts.build:backend: npm run build:shared && npm run build --workspace=@stamp-card/backend
scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
